short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy manager for toggling specific cookies on and off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BWT Cookie Manager is a simple tool that allows the user to add a cookie and track its status on any open tab which temporarily disables A/B testing functionality provided by Sitespect. This allows a customer support agent to quickly determine whether an issue is coming from a campaign or from the host website.
